Detail:
1 of 2) Replace 9V Batteries in all Smoke Alarms including backup battery in electrically wire Smoke alarms in :

* Cabins
* Lodge Rooms
* Nurse's Office
* Manager/Nurse Dorm
* Lower Bath Rooms

2 of 2) Replace the 6V battery for the Lodge smoke/fire alarm system. This is located in the Lower hallway of the Lodge
Title: Replace Batteries in All Smoke Detectors
